question: Who among the following was a member of the Justice J.S. Verma Committee constituted following Nirbhaya case?
explanation: Justice Verma Committee was constituted following Nirbhaya case to recommend amendments to the criminal law so as to provide for quicker trial and enhanced punishment for criminals accused of committing sexual assault against women. On December 23, 2012 a three member committee headed by Justice J.S. Verma, former chief Justice of the S.C. the other members of the committee were justice Leila Seth, former judge of the H.C. and Gopal Subramanium, former Soliciter General of India.
